SCTX:
Begin venimGuardScript

float timer

if ( timer == -1 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex HR_RescueSarethi < 50 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex HR_RescueSarethi >= 70 )
	Return
endif

set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )

if ( timer < 3 )
	Return
endif

Set timer to 0

if ( GetDetected "Varvur Sarethi" == 1 )
	StartCombat Player
	Set timer to -1
endif

End
